title: Massive Game Music Collection
description: Massive library of high quality music! 200+ unique music tracks!
longDescription:
Part of Total Music Collection - huge music collection for any project (20GB+ of high quality audio, 800+ different music tracks)!


Massive library of high quality music for a variety of genres: action, adventure, fantasy, casual, horror, puzzle and more! All at an incredibly low price!


BROWSE ALL TRACKS ON SOUNDCLOUD OR MIXCLOUD.

  • 200+ unique music tracks;
  • 5GB+ of high quality audio;
  • 30 different packs.


THE COLLECTION CONTAINS:

Action & Dramatic Soundtrack

Casual Background Music Pack

Casual Game Music Pack (Acoustic Guitar Versions)

Dramatic Symphonic Game Music Pack

Combat Music Pack 

Space Ambience Pack
